description._content: Clough, Stanley Thomas,, 1905-, artist. Spare our trees Ohio : Federal Art Project, W.P.A., 1938. 1 print on board (poster) : silkscreen, color. Notes: Date stamped on verso: Aug 17 1938. Work Projects Administration Poster Collection (Library of Congress). Poster promoting conservation of trees as a natural resource. Subjects: Trees--Ohio--1930-1940. Leaves--1930-1940. State parks & reserves--Ohio--1930-1940. Conservation of natural resources--Ohio--1930-1940. Format: Posters--1930-1940. Screen prints--Color--1930-1940. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
